author: Russell B Brinkmann

review: I purchased my 1st Fire Stick in Dec 2014. It stopped working 5 weeks later - 1 week after the warranty ended.  I complained to Amazon and they sent me a new replacement Fire Stick. That one lasted a bit longer, but once again, my Amazon Fire Stick quit working. Our other TV (both TV's are the same model) has a Roku 3 media player that constantly works. Yes. I am trashing the 2nd Amazon Fire Stick and buying another Roku.Don't waste your money on the Amazon Fire Stick.
